import{configureStore,createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";//받아오는 데이터//
var initialState={suggestionLoading:false,suggestionData:null,error:null};var suggestionSlice=createSlice({name:"suggestions",initialState:initialState,reducers:{//suggestion
suggestionRequest:function suggestionRequest(state,_action){state.suggestionLoading=true;state.error=null;},suggestionSuccess:function suggestionSuccess(state,action){state.suggestionLoading=false;state.suggestionData=action.payload;},suggestionFailure:function suggestionFailure(state,action){state.suggestionLoading=true;state.error=action.payload;},//suggestionResult
suggestionAcceptRequest:function suggestionAcceptRequest(state,_action){state.suggestionLoading=true;state.error=null;},suggestionAcceptSuccess:function suggestionAcceptSuccess(state,action){console.log('suggestionAcceptSuccess 실행');state.suggestionLoading=false;state.suggestionData=action.payload;},suggestionAcceptFailure:function suggestionAcceptFailure(state,action){state.suggestionLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},suggestionRejectRequest:function suggestionRejectRequest(state,_action){state.suggestionLoading=true;state.error=null;},suggestionRejectSuccess:function suggestionRejectSuccess(state,action){state.suggestionLoading=false;state.suggestionData=action.payload;},suggestionRejectFailure:function suggestionRejectFailure(state,action){state.suggestionLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;}}});var store=configureStore({reducer:{suggestion:suggestionSlice.reducer}});var reducer=suggestionSlice.reducer,actions=suggestionSlice.actions;var suggestionRequest=actions.suggestionRequest,suggestionSuccess=actions.suggestionSuccess,suggestionFailure=actions.suggestionFailure,suggestionAcceptRequest=actions.suggestionAcceptRequest,suggestionAcceptSuccess=actions.suggestionAcceptSuccess,suggestionAcceptFailure=actions.suggestionAcceptFailure,suggestionRejectRequest=actions.suggestionRejectRequest,suggestionRejectSuccess=actions.suggestionRejectSuccess,suggestionRejectFailure=actions.suggestionRejectFailure;export{suggestionRequest,suggestionSuccess,suggestionFailure,suggestionAcceptRequest,suggestionAcceptSuccess,suggestionAcceptFailure,suggestionRejectRequest,suggestionRejectSuccess,suggestionRejectFailure};export default reducer;
